com.lab.utils

Class FileFinder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lab.utils.FileFinder

  • public class FileFinder
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is a custom FileFinder which has been extended from SimpleFileVisitor. Given a pattern (glob format) and a starting directory, this class finds all the files recursively.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  FileFinder.Finder
      Inner class which extends SimpleFileVisitor and provides additional methods to help traverse the file directory.
